dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 424 IH: Mohave County Radiation Compensation Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gosar (for himself and Mr. Franks of Arizona) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To include the county of Mohave, in the State of Arizona, as an affected area for purposes of making claims under the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act based on exposure to atmospheric nuclear testing.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Mohave County Radiation Compensation Act of 2013.

section.header: Inclusion under the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act
section.text: Section 4(b)(1)(C) of the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act (42 U.S.C. 2210 note) is amended by inserting Mohave, after Apache,.
